subject: Football
Human Growth Hormone
Tests (Drug Use)
United States Politics and Government
Doping (Sports)
organizations: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
lead_paragraph: A meeting held by members of Congress with officials from the N.F.L., its players’ association and an anti-doping agency did not produce a timetable for a blood-testing program.
snippet: A meeting held by members of Congress with officials from the N.F.L., its players’ association and an anti-doping agency did not produce a timetable for a blood-testing program.
